summary:
This mod adds a one handed version of the Bloodskal Blade.
NOTE: The enchantment has been removed, but the blade can be enchanted.
Also, this is my first mod. So be gentle, and extra cautious!
Called Faint because I faint when I see Blood. *Ba dum Tissss*
descriptionHtml:
NEW Cleaner version added. It\'s standalone and has less bugs. It also leaves the original 2-hander alone. Can also craft it now.

Dragonborn required.
Installation: Add the mesh inside the meshes/weapons/dlc02/bloodsword folder
Install the esp inside the Data folder. Activate
Done!

-Craft it under the MISC Category. Must have Advanced Steel Smithing Perk.
-Temper it with a Silver Ingot.
-Can also add through console, type help Faint
-Can enchant with any weapon enchantment


I really liked the Bloodskal Blade for its Gothic appearance, but I felt it was very limited as a bulky two-hander. This mod adds a duplicate of the blade, with some slight modifications to the original Bloodskal Blade files (Nifskope and Creation Kit).

Unfortunately, the enchantment had to be removed because it was a script, which was way outside my bounds. Hence, if anyone wants to re-make my mod, feel free to use my files.

In the mean time, I suggest you use Imbued Weapons - Bloodskal Effect with any Melee Weapon by ChizFoShiz. Also, Bloodskal Gothic Retexture by Zazil works really well with this Blade, so use his mod too!

Detailed list of changes:
Weight changed to 15.
Reach/Stagger the same.
Value changed to 666.
Damage changed to 25.
Critical is set to 10.
Affects One-handed skill tree.
Sounds changed to one handed swords.
Speed: 1.000
Stagger: 1.1000
Reach: 1.300
author: Drahaka
